Uses of Class
mp3player.desktopaudio.MediaFormat

    • Uses of MediaFormat in mp3player.desktopaudio

      Methods in mp3player.desktopaudio that return MediaFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MediaFormat MediaInfo.getFormat() 
      MediaFormat Player.getMediaFormat()
      If loaded, this method returns the MediaFormat of this player's media, otherwise null.
      MediaFormat MediaStream.getMediaFormat()
      Returns the MediaFormat of this stream or null if not available.

      Constructor and Description
